When measuring the impact of extreme flooding events based on floodplain coverage, Community District 9 appears largely unaffected.

155th St

Hamilton Heights

The map shows the projected areas vulnerable to flooding from a 1 percent chance storm in 2050.

The floodplain covers 10 percent of the district’s area, but 0 percent of the population lives in the floodplain. Only 25 out of over 26,000 buildings are constructed in the floodplain.

Manhattanville

Morningside

Heights

110th St

Manhattan

Source: NYC Open Data. NYC Hazard Mitigation: Community Risk Assessment Dashboard. Note: 311 Data as of March 20, 2023.

Graphic by Adina Cazacu-De Luca
